events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and will review it shortly.
The application has been categorised under Engineering as the candidate has relevant experience as a developer.
A recruiter has been assigned to manage the candidateâ€™s process and coordinate the following interviews.
The initial screening call was completed successfully with the candidate who demonstrated strong fundamentals in software development.
The candidate responded positively to the invitation for a technical interview and confirmed availability next week.
Technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th at 10 AM to evaluate the candidate's coding and problem-solving skills.
The candidate performed well during the technical interview, demonstrating strong algorithmic thinking and relevant development experience.
The HR interview has been scheduled to discuss cultural fit, benefits, and candidate expectations following the successful technical round.
HR interview completed positively; the candidate discussed their career goals and aligned well with company values.
An official job offer for the engineer position has been proposed to the candidate with competitive salary and benefits.
Candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining the engineering team.
The candidate formally accepted the offer and confirmed their start date next month.
Onboarding process has commenced with introduction to the engineering team and setup of development environment.
The hiring process has been successfully completed, and the candidate is now fully onboarded as a software engineer.
